verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here in the mystery
Here in your majesty
I find myself
With nothing to offer
Your love surrounds me
You give me Yourself

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My soul rests
My soul rests
In Your embrace

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My spirit sings
My spirit sings
All your praise

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Here in your presence
The whole host of heaven
Bows down low

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
There's no higher honour
No love that's greater
You make us Your own

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You're so close
Jesus so close to me
Like the breath in my lungs
